property.name: Low Luck for Bombing and Territory Damage
Remove All Tech Tokens At End Of Turn
Paratroopers Can Move During Non Combat
Paratroopers Can Attack Deep Into Enemy Territory
Two HitPoint Units Require Repair Facilities
Airborne Attacks Only In Existing Battles
Airborne Attacks Only In Enemy Territories
Unplaced units live when not placed
On Entering Units Destroyed Instead Of Captured
Units Can Be Destroyed Instead Of Captured
Units Can Be Changed On Capture
Blitz Through Factories And AA Restricted
Force AA Attacks For Last Step Of Fly Over
Defending Suicide and Munition Units Do Not Fire
Shore Bombard Per Ground Unit Restricted
Submarines Defending May Submerge Or Retreat
Subs Can End NonCombat Move With Enemies
Naval Units May Not NonCombat Move Into Controlled Sea Zones
Convoy Blockades Roll Dice For Cost
Produce new fighters on old carriers
Move existing fighters to new carriers
Land existing fighters on new carriers
Abandoned Territories May Be Taken Over Immediately
Battles May Be Preceeded By Air Battles
Raids May Be Preceeded By Air Battles
Damage From Bombing Done To Units Instead Of Territories
Use Bombing Max Dice Sides And Bonus
Limit SBR Damage To Factory Production
notes
property.value:
A hypothetical series of wars in 16th Century Europe. In this scenario, The Habsburg Monarchy manages to bring all of its holdings into a strongly unified single nation. The powerful nations of France, Russia, and the Ottoman Empire unite to stop this growing threat, and the other nations of Europe take sides. The game isn't historically accurate, its just an attempt to capture various conflicts from Europe in this era and bring them into a single scenario. It also aims to include often unseen but powerful nations, such as Denmark, Sweden, Poland, and Venice.

Credits:
Primary map design and XML by Crazy G.
Unit art by Frostion.
Unit and map art by Hepps.
Special thanks to WC_Sumpton for assitance creating XML
Thanks to the design team and everyone who has provided feedback so far.

Nations in Turn Order
Nation Alliance
France Anti-Habsburg Alliance
Habsburg_Monarchy Habsburg Alliance
Italian_States Habsburg Alliance
Ottoman_Empire Anti-Habsburg Alliance
Russia Anti-Habsburg Alliance
Poland-Lithuania Habsburg Alliance
Sweden Habsburg Alliance
Denmark Anti-Habsburg Alliance


Unit Stats
Units ATK DEF Move Cost Special
Pikemen 4 5 1 12 +1 defense if the enemy has a knight (1 boost per enemy knight)
Musketmen 6 6 1 15 Suppress- One enemy pikemen recieves -1 attack,-1 defense
Cannon 5 5 1 15 Rolls 2 dice, but dies instantly if unprotected
Knights 7 6 2 18 2 movement. Can blitz
Navy 5 6 2 20 Can transport 1 unit
Buildings
Half Castle 20 Turn 1 of building a castle
Can be captured
Castle 20 Must consumes a half castle to build.
Blocks the highest 5 enemy dice rolls
City Can produce units up to value of a territory
Cannot build new cities
Village Allows you to place one pikemen.
Consumed on use, cannot be built
You can only build one pikemen via village per territory per turn
Castle clarifications
It will stop the highest 5 enemy dice from being rolled. This means 5 pikemen have a 0% to take a castle guarded by any unit with HP. Cannons roll two dice, which means a castle will only block half of their attack.

Cannon clarifications
Cannons will roll 2 dice. In LL it means they have 10 attack instead of 5. In dice it means one cannon can kill two enemies.

Village clarifications
You can only use one village in a territory per turn. Don't buy pikemen to place in villages. Buy recruits.(Be nice to another when editing this please)

Technologies
You receive a technology for free on turns 1,3,4,7 etc.
Technologies will activate the next turn
Tech Name Effect
March Pikemen and Musketmen gain 1 March
(+1 movement in noncombat move only)
IronHorseshoes Knights gain 1 March.
HorsedrawnArtillery Cannons gain 1 March.
TercioFormation Musketmen gain +1 defense
HeavyCannons Cannons roll 3 dice, but have -1 attack
Hussars Knights gain +1 attack
Sailing Navies gain 1 March
NavalCannons Navies gain +1 attack
ShipoftheLine Navies gain +1 defense
